summary: A federal witness runs away and a team of government agents track him down, but when they take a shortcut on the return trip, they're attacked by zombies.
cast: Lou Diamond Phillips|Lori Petty|Steven Williams|L.Q. Jones|Dale Midkiff|Alex McArthur|Mercedes Colon|Rob Roy Fitzgerald|Adam Vernier|Chester E. Tripp III|Rhino Michaels|Gary Roberts|Peewee Piemonte|Michael Chance|Dick Miller|Gary Farmer|Sven-Ole Thorsen|Michael R. Long|John Cade|Chuck Hicks|Stephen R. Hudis|Anne Lockhart|Nick Plantico
title: Ruta 666
